akn:section.akn:heading: Air National Guard of the United States: status when not in Federal service

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 10113. Air National Guard of the United States: status when not in Federal service When not on active duty, members of the Air National Guard of the United States shall be administered, armed, equipped, and trained in their status as members of the Air National Guard. (Added Pub. L. 103–337, div. A, title XVI, § 1661(a)(1), Oct. 5, 1994, 108 Stat. 2971.)
Editorial Notes Prior ProvisionsProvisions similar to those in this section were contained in section 8079 of this title, prior to repeal by Pub. L. 103–337, § 1661(a)(3)(A).
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective DateSection effective Dec. 1, 1994, except as otherwise provided, see section 1691 of Pub. L. 103–337, set out as a note under section 10001 of this title.
